text: Joseph Michael Kramer (born June 21, 1950) is an American rock drummer, songwriter and businessman. He is known as a member of the hard rock band Aerosmith. He was born in The Bronx, New York. In 2019, Kramer missed some shows during Aerosmith’s Las Vegas residency due to an injury suffered in a “minor accident.” ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Aerosmith members Category:American songwriters Category:American rock drummers Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Joey Kramer
